title: The Great God Pan
description: Pan, both goat and god, is a curious being who roams nature searching, wondering, and frolicking with maenads and satyrs. He plays melodies on his reed flute, wooing animals to listen. He is a creature of mystery and delight. One day in his travels, Pan meets Iphigenia, a human raised as the daughter of King Agamemnon and Queen Clytemnestra. Pan is captivated by the young princess. Set against a landscape of myth and legend, Napoliâ€™s latest tale is a love story wrought with sincere emotion and all that is great about the Gods.From the Hardcover edition.
author: Donna Jo Napoli
